00018 /** @file interface.h
00019  *
00020  * Functions, structures, etc. to access the interface of the controller board
00021  */
00022 #ifndef __TMCL_INTERFACE_H_
00023 #define __TMCL_INTERFACE_H_
00024 
00025 #include <tmcl/tmcldefs.h>
00026 
00027 struct TMCLInterfaceStruct;
00028 
00029 /** Function pointers for open/close and read/write interface communication functions */
00030 typedef int (*tmcl_open_funcPtr)(struct TMCLInterfaceStruct *iface, const char *ifacename, void *);
00031 typedef int (*tmcl_close_funcPtr)(struct TMCLInterfaceStruct *iface, void *);
00032 typedef int (*tmcl_write_funcPtr)(struct TMCLInterfaceStruct *iface, const void *buffer, int length, void *);
00033 typedef int (*tmcl_read_funcPtr)(struct TMCLInterfaceStruct *iface, char *buffer, void *);
00034 
00035 /** Struct to store information about the controller interface */
00036 typedef struct TMCLInterfaceStruct {
00037     union {
00038         int                     fd;
00039          /* Here may go handles for CAN, etc in the future */
00040     } handle; /**< handle to access the interface */
00041 
00042     char *ifacename;
00043     TMCLBusType bus;
00044 #ifndef SWIG /* These are internal C functions and should not be visible in python */
00045     tmcl_open_funcPtr   _open;
00046     void *tmcl_open_void;       /**< Void pointer store a custom open function */
00047     tmcl_close_funcPtr  _close;
00048     void *tmcl_close_void;      /**< Void pointer store a custom data close function */
00049     tmcl_write_funcPtr  _write;
00050     void *tmcl_write_void;      /**< Void pointer store a custom data write function */
00051     tmcl_read_funcPtr   _read;
00052     void *tmcl_read_void;       /**< Void pointer store a custom data read function */
00053 #endif
00054     /** Timeouts */
00055     unsigned int timeout_sec;   /**< Timeout for reading from device (seconds) (Default 2)*/
00056     unsigned int timeout_msec;  /**< Timeout for reading from device (milliseconds) (Default 0)*/
00057     /** Due to the processing time of the board it may be necessary to wait some microseconds
00058      * until the reply is ready. */ 
00059     unsigned int timewait_sec;  /**< Time to wait for reply of board (seconds) (Default 0)*/
00060     unsigned int timewait_msec; /**< Time to wait for reply of board (milliseconds) (Default 10) */
00061 } TMCLInterface;
00062 
00063 
00064 /** Initialize TMCLInterface struct
00065  *
00066  * Custom open/close/read/write functions may be given here. Use \c NULL to use the builtin functions.
00067  *
00068  * \return
00069  *      -  0 on success
00070  *      - -1 on failure
00071  *
00072  */
00073 int  tmcl_init_interface(TMCLInterface **iface, TMCLBusType bus, tmcl_open_funcPtr open, tmcl_close_funcPtr close, tmcl_read_funcPtr read, tmcl_write_funcPtr write);
00074 
00075 /** Set custom open function for interface
00076 */
00077 void tmcl_set_open_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *func_pointer);
00078 
00079 /** Set custom close function for interface
00080 */
00081 void tmcl_set_close_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *func_pointer);
00082 
00083 /** Set custom read function for interface
00084 */
00085 void tmcl_set_read_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *func_pointer);
00086 
00087 /** Set custom write function for interface
00088 */
00089 void tmcl_set_write_data(TMCLInterface *iface, void *func_pointer);
00090 
00091 /** Deinitialize interface */
00092 void tmcl_deinit_interface(TMCLInterface **iface);
00093 
00094 /** Open interface *
00095  *
00096  * \param[in] iface TMCLInterface struct
00097  * \param[in] filename filename of interface device (for RSXXX)
00098  *
00099  * \return
00100  *      -  0 on success
00101  *      - -1 on failure
00102  */
00103 int tmcl_open_interface(TMCLInterface *iface, const char *filename);
00104 
00105 /** Close interface *
00106  *
00107  * \return
00108  *      -  0 on success
00109  *      - -1 on failure
00110  */
00111 int tmcl_close_interface(TMCLInterface *iface);
00112 
00113 /** Adjust timout for interface communication */
00114 void tmcl_interface_set_timeout(TMCLInterface *iface, unsigned int sec, unsigned int msec);
00115 
00116 /** Adjust how long to wait for reply from motor controller */
00117 void tmcl_interface_set_timewait(TMCLInterface *iface, unsigned int sec, unsigned int msec);
00118 
00119 #endif /* INTERFACE_H_ */
